dbDAO

Class CompanyDBDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbDAO.CompanyDBDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompanyDAO, java.io.Serializable

    public class CompanyDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompanyDAO, java.io.Serializable
    The class Company is the class that do all the required access work with DB using the methods below. implements CompanyDAO and apply the following methods. this class using the SqlQueries class for all the SQL queries in all methods.
    Author:
    user

      • createCompany

        public void createCompany(Company company)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException,
                          java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                          java.lang.InterruptedException,
                          DuplicateException
        creatCompany method is receiving a company instance and set it to the DB. Creatorclass first checking in front of DB if the company already exist in case the response is true it will throw an DuplicateException otherwise Creatorclass will set it to DB and return the id number that the DB adjusted to the new company and save it in sqlId member.
        Specified by:

      • removeCompany

        public void removeCompany(Company company)
                   throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                          java.sql.SQLException,
                          java.lang.InterruptedException,
                          NotAvailableException
        This method removing all the company records including coupons that exist even in a customer ownership. SqlExecuteclass checking in front of the DB if the company exist in case that the response is false it will throw an DuplicateException otherwise it will remove the require company and it's marketed coupons from all the tables in DB. than return an announcement that this particularly company has removed.
        Specified by:
        removeCompany in interface CompanyDAO
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • getCompanyById

        public Company getCompanyById(long id)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException,
                              java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                              java.lang.InterruptedException,
                              NotAvailableException
        This method is returning a company instance from the DB according to the id that received in the method signature. than run a quarry to the DB using CompList class. extract values and the new company instance update it's fields with this values next step will be the creating a new CouponDBDAO instance and informing it's compID member with the same company id that previous recalls. finally the company instance will add all it's marked coupons into it's ArrayListmember.
        Specified by:
        getCompanyById in interface CompanyDAO
        Returns:
        Throws:
        NotAvailableException
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

              throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,

        this method is operate the login in front the DB using SQLException class. it receiving a String values for name and password and authenticating those values than returning a boolean values according the result. it also returning the id value and update the sqlId field in case the ResultSet is back with data.
